definition: The process of transmitting information or data from one location to another, typically through electronic means. It is commonly employed in various fields, including telecommunications, computer networks, and digital technology.

examples.german: Die Datenübertragung erfolgt über eine sichere Verbindung.
examples.english: The data transfer is done over a secure connection.
The data transfer speed is very high.
The data transfer can be done wirelessly.
The data transfer needs to be encrypted.
